Sentencas: The microstructure, geometry and accurate distribution of dopants in nickel-doped ceria nanoparticles prepared by spray pyrolysis were characterized.
Titulo: Mechanism of dopant distribution: An example of nickel-doped ceria nanoparticles

Sentencas: Nickel dopant concentration variation with the distance from the centre of the particle can be approximated as linear with a higher concentration of nickel found closer to the centre.
Titulo: Mechanism of dopant distribution: An example of nickel-doped ceria nanoparticles

Sentencas: It is suggested that the dopant distribution is mainly controlled by the difference in the diffusion rates of the precursors from the centre to the surface of the particle.
Titulo: Mechanism of dopant distribution: An example of nickel-doped ceria nanoparticles
